## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pbqp">PBQP</a> register allocation constraint composer.

Constraints added to this list will be applied, in the order that they are added, to the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pbqp">PBQP</a> graph.

Definition at line 50 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/pbqpraconstraint-h">PBQPRAConstraint.h</a>.
